title: Verizon delivers welcome 5G update for LG Wing
content:
Verizon has released a surprise software update for the LG Wing. With this latest update, the handset will now offer support for Verizon’s C-Band 5G network and will gain Android’s April security update. What makes this a pleasant surprise is that around a year ago, LG pulled the plug on its smartphone division. So it’s good to know

The post Verizon delivers welcome 5G update for LG Wing appeared first on XDA.
description: Verizon has delivered a surprise up for the LG Wing that will enhance its 5G capabilties, giving it access to its mid-range spectrum.
